Package model.wheel

Interface Wheel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WheelImpl
    public interface Wheel
    Represents a wheel in the Further Programming Assignment

    This interface should be implemented as WheelImpl.

    Maintains a collection of Slot and using the methods described in this interface provides functionality of turning wheel from one slot to the next.

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    WheelImpl, Slot

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int LARGEST_SLOT_NUMBER
      A constant the defines the maximum slot number in the wheel's slots
      static int NUMBER_OF_SLOTS
      A constant that defines the number of slots in the wheel
      static int[] SLOT_NUMBERS
      An array populated with the slot numbers of the wheel, in order starting from slot position 1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int generateRandomPosition()
      Generates a random slot position.
      java.util.Collection<Slot> generateWheel()
      Helper method that generates a collection of all the slot objects that populate the wheel.
      Slot moveToPosition​(int position)
      Moves wheel the supplied position and returns the slot at / with that position
      Slot nextSlot()
      Advances the wheel to the next slot and returns the slot at that position.

    • Field Detail

      • SLOT_NUMBERS

        static final int[] SLOT_NUMBERS
        An array populated with the slot numbers of the wheel, in order starting from slot position 1

      • NUMBER_OF_SLOTS

        static final int NUMBER_OF_SLOTS
        A constant that defines the number of slots in the wheel

      • LARGEST_SLOT_NUMBER

        static final int LARGEST_SLOT_NUMBER
        A constant the defines the maximum slot number in the wheel's slots

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomPosition

        int generateRandomPosition()
        Generates a random slot position. Returned number is between 1 and NUMBER_OF_SLOTS inclusive.
        Returns:
        a valid random slot position

      • moveToPosition

        Slot moveToPosition​(int position)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Moves wheel the supplied position and returns the slot at / with that position
        Parameters:
        position - the slot position to move to
        Returns:
        the slot at / with the specified position
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied position is not a valid position for the wheel
        See Also:
        Slot

      • nextSlot

        Slot nextSlot()
        Advances the wheel to the next slot and returns the slot at that position.
        Returns:
        the slot at the current wheel position
        See Also:
        Slot

      • generateWheel

        java.util.Collection<Slot> generateWheel()
        Helper method that generates a collection of all the slot objects that populate the wheel.

        This public method aides in automated testing of your code.

        Returns:
        a collection of slot representing the complete wheel
        See Also:
        Slot, Collection
